alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 12:48PM AKST until December 29 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Wrangell and Petersburg. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected midday Wednesday. There is potential for freezing drizzle throughout the event, which would lower overall snowfall totals.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. An advisory means that a potentially hazardous event is already occurring or imminent.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
